item.title: Imaging Genetics of Modern Human Brain Shape
item.description: In the news: New York Times CNN Science Nature LiveScience Forbes The Independent Psychology Today References Gunz, Neubauer, Maureille & Hublin. Brain development after birth differs between Neanderthals and modern humans. Curr Biol 20, R921-R922 (2010).
